title: A desperate Trump puts his racism on full display
description: The president’s attacks on Somali-Americans are the latest sign he is failing — and he knows it
content: Donald Trump needs to put the phone down at night and get some sleep. After spending three hours Monday night manically sharing more than 160 bizarre posts on Truth Social, he spent most of Tuesdays … [+5959 chars]
